comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: ASIMITOKEN on September 23, 2022, 03:58:38 PMA tokenized economy that uses blockchain technology to benefit advertisers and put money in the hands of people who need it the most."Put in the hands of people who need it the most" XDXD Who is going to be the judge to say who is the one who needs my money the most?  So if "the judge" will say that I don't need my money he will take it from me?  This project does not look like a good deal.

comments.author: Jaered
comments.body: I have seen so many projects promise to do just that, take money from the big bad corporations and hand them dutifully to the poor teeming masses. Only problem is they take the money and actually put it in their own pockets, giving those teeming masses the finger

comments.author: ASIMITOKEN
comments.body: We sell advertising space on our website and we transfer the crypto revenue directly into the hands of people viewing ads. It is a real and simple way to earn income from home that millions of online users are searching for.Firstly; We sell advertising. Advertisers can buy advertising products and get views of their ads/surveys/website/games. (You can learn more about our Advertising Products here) Secondly; We then display the ads for people to view. Anyone can watch ads, complete surveys, play games, and for that, they get paid.This has created a functioning marketplace that brings advertisers, viewers, buyers and sellers to one location. The result; A reliable business that allows you to start earning income from home. Hashing Ad Space opens the door for anyone to easily become involved in the incredible opportunity cryptocurrency offers the world today. With no experience necessary, and no payment required, you can earn from home. You watch ads... you get paid.Watch about this here:https://youtu.be/gwSE3DckLe8Or talk with us on our Telegram:https://t.me/HashingAdSpace

comments.author: ASIMITOKEN
comments.body: You can register and earn your first Asimi tokens within minutes. Watch ads, get paid.The paid ads section is simple. Advertisers have placed their ads on the Ad Selection Board with a price they are willing to pay per ad view. If you watch the ad, you earn the exact displayed Asimi tokens value next to the ad. You get paid immediately.every Asimi yields 0.17-0.18% (in Asimi) daily at the moment.So, 1 Asimi earns You 0.0017-0.0018 Asimi per day minting.Just multiply the 1-Asimi-earning by the Asimi amount You want to know üòâ

comments.author: ASIMITOKEN
comments.body: 1- Our top earners are Asimi minters. Minting Asimi is the #1 way to earn the most at Hashing Ad Space.2- Our affiliates, in particular, Affiliates that recommend our advertising and minting earn considerable rewards of up to 50% commissions on advertising packages. With advertising packages up to $5000, this can be a significant affiliate commissions income.3- A little of everything. The majority of our members use all of our services and earn in several ways. This adds up, and with time, you'll find you have earned a lot of crypto!

comments.author: ASIMITOKEN
comments.body: Hashing Ad Space wishes to encourage members to stake Asimi and mint ads, this is why we are offering various bonuses and perks, which are explained below.Every member that wishes to stake Asimi is given an Asimi Membership Level, based on the amount of Asimi they have at stake. The Levels are as follows:Minting Captcha - members that have between 100 and 1000 Asimi at stake will have to go through a captcha for every ad they want to see. Members with more that 1000 Asimi at stake will not have to go through this.Free Daily Minting to Wallet - you will get free withdrawals to your wallet every day if you choose to get paid to your wallet daily. This applies to levels Asimi Hero and up.Free Monthly Minting to Wallet - you will get free withdrawals to your wallet every 1st of the month if you choose to get paid to your wallet monthly. This applies to levels Asimi Leader and up.Discount on Ad Purchases (excluding V2E) - qualified members get an automatic discount for products that can be purchased with Asimi (Ad Minter Ads, Banner Ads, Login Ad days). This applies to levels Asimi Builder and up and varies based on the member's level.Minting Multiplier¬† - your Asimi is now worth more for minting if you're over a certain level. This means that you will get a larger share of the minting pool every day if you qualify for that particular level. Applies to levels Asimi Grower and up.Monthly Minting Multiplier¬† -keep your Asimi Level for more than one month and you will get a minting bonus. This means that you will get a larger share of the minting pool every day if you qualify for that particular level. Applies to levels Asimi Collector and up.Yearly Minting Multiplier¬† -keep your Asimi Level for more than one year and you will get a minting bonus. This means that you will get a larger share of the minting pool every day if you qualify for that particular level. Applies to levels Asimi Grower and up.NOTE: the Minting Multiplier, Monthly Minting Multiplier and Yearly Minting Multiplier can be added together, if all conditions are met.Auto Ad Viewer - the number of ads you have to watch to earn that day will be reduced by 50% if you're an Asimi Superstar and completely if you're an Asimian
